trans-unit.source: If you are creating an application with no reference to Microsoft.WindowsAzure.CloudConfigurationManager, and your connection string is located in the web.config or app.config as show above, then you can use ConfigurationManager to retrieve the connection string.
trans-unit.target: If you are creating an application with no reference to Microsoft.WindowsAzure.CloudConfigurationManager, and your connection string is located in the web.config or app.config as show above, then you can use ConfigurationManager to retrieve the connection string.
